description: Mobile techniques used by HummingWhale, ATT&CK software S0321 v1.1
name: HummingWhale (S0321)

techniques.comment: [HummingWhale](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0321) generates revenue by displaying fraudulent ads and automatically installing apps. When victims try to close the ads, [HummingWhale](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0321) runs in a virtual machine, creating a fake ID that allows the perpetrators to generate revenue.(Citation: ArsTechnica-HummingWhale)
